name: caretype_flat_view
title: Flat view definition for Observation (Care Service) resource
description: A flattened view of Observation resources representing care services. It extracts key identification, category, and care service details from the component array.

column.name: id
column.description: The logical ID of the Observation resource.

column.name: category_coding_system
column.description: System URL for the first coding of the first category.

column.name: category_coding_code
column.description: Code for the first coding of the first category.

column.name: category_coding_display
column.description: Display text for the first coding of the first category.

column.name: category_text
column.description: Text representation of the first category.

column.name: care_type
column.description: The type of care service, extracted from the 'CARE-SERVICE-TYPE' component.

column.name: visit_number
column.description: The visit number, extracted from the 'CARE-SERVICE-VISIT-NUMBER' component.
